sentences.en: Nearly 60 banks have rubber-stamped a refinancing deal.
sentences.cn: 将近60家银行已经不加思索地批准了一项重新融资的交易。

sentences.en: Parliament is seen as a rubber stamp for decisions made elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 议会被看作橡皮图章，只会批准他人的决定。

sentences.en: Parliament's job is to rubber-stamp his decisions.
sentences.cn: 国会的工作就是例行公事式地批准他作出的决定。

sentences.en: Seven people were wounded when soldiers fired rubber bullets to disperse crowds.
sentences.cn: 士兵发射橡皮子弹驱散人群时有7个人受了伤。

sentences.en: She sat there, reclined against a foam rubber cushion.
sentences.cn: 她在那儿倚靠着海绵橡胶垫坐着.

sentences.en: Some of the prisoners were beaten about the head with rubber truncheons.
sentences.cn: 一些囚犯头部遭到橡皮警棍的击打.

sentences.en: The accident was caused by people slowing down to rubber-neck.
sentences.cn: 事故是由为了看热闹而减速的人引起的。

sentences.en: The lad was wearing rubber-soled shoes.
sentences.cn: 这个小伙子穿着橡胶底的鞋子。

sentences.en: the pungent smell of burning rubber
The rubber skirts round the bottom of a hovercraft were destroyed.
sentences.cn: 气垫船底部四周的橡胶护板被毁了.

sentences.en: The stair treads were covered with rubber to prevent slipping.
sentences.cn: 楼梯踏板上覆盖着橡胶以防滑.

sentences.en: The teacher is cleaning the blackboard with a board rubber.
sentences.cn: 老师正在用黑板擦擦黑板.

sentences.en: Wear rubber gloves when handling cat litter.
sentences.cn: 清理猫粪时要带上橡胶手套。

sentences.en: Wear rubber gloves while chopping chillies as they can irritate the skin.
sentences.cn: 切辣椒时要戴橡胶手套，因为辣椒会刺激皮肤。

words.tran_cn: 橡胶似的；有弹力的；坚韧的
伸长脖子看的人；爱问长问短的人；跟着向导游览的人
[橡胶]橡胶；橡皮；合成橡胶；按摩师

phrases.tran_cn: 橡胶配合物；橡胶封口胶
搓纸轮；橡胶辊筒；橡皮辊子
n. 橡胶密封圈；橡皮垫；橡胶塞；橡皮密封
硅橡胶；硅掾胶；聚硅铜橡胶

trans.tran_cn: 橡胶，橡皮擦，避孕套，一局，投手板，多轮决胜负的比赛
trans.tran_en: a substance used to make tyres, boots etc, which is made from the juice of a tropical tree or artificially
